title: Authors and Citation
text: Kisistok J (2022). gglongi: Visualizing longitudinal data. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://juditkisistok.github.io/gglongi/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {gglongi: Visualizing longitudinal data},   author = {Judit Kisistok},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://juditkisistok.github.io/gglongi/}, }

title: Title — gglongi
code: gglongi(   data,   x_val,   y_val,   col_val,   col_legend = T,   mean_line = T,   x_title = x_val,   y_title = y_val,   treatments = NA,   scans = NA,   progression = NA,   treatment_start,   treatment_end,   treatment_drug,   scan_date,   event_date )

what: Calculate the mean value per time point — mean_val_per_timepoint
title: Calculate the mean value per time point — mean_val_per_timepoint
text: Calculate mean value per time point

title: Calculate the mean value per time point — mean_val_per_timepoint
Calculate the mean value per time point — mean_val_per_timepoint
text: data data.frame used calculation. contain column values summarized, corresponding time points denoting measurement taken. Zero-value entries ignored completely removed calculation, unless every value corresponding time point zero. time_col string Name column containing time data. val_col string Name column containing values summarize.

title: Calculate the mean value per time point — mean_val_per_timepoint
text: tibble containing mean value individual time point. data frame contains two columns - original time_col column calculated mean value column format Mean_[val_col].

title: Calculate the mean value per time point — mean_val_per_timepoint
code: x <- data.frame(          days_from_baseline = c(0, 0, 0, 27, 27),          MAF = c(0, 0.009, 0.007, 0.012, 0.032))  mean_val_per_timepoint(x, 'days_from_baseline', 'MAF') #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   days_from_baseline Mean_MAF #>                <dbl>    <dbl> #> 1                  0    0.008 #> 2                 27    0.022

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.
